headline: Duke Energy (DUK) Gains As Market Dips: What You Should Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Duke Energy (DUK) stood at $107.82, denoting a +0.07% change from the preceding trading day.

headline: Duke Energy's Arm Announces 6.2% Rate Cut for North Carolina Customers
summary: DUK's subsidiary, Duke Energy Carolinas, announces that it will lower rates and decrease customer bills starting from Jan. 1, 2025.

headline: Duke Energy Florida seeks to recover $1.1bn in hurricane response costs

headline: Duke Energy Carolinas customer rates drop 6.2% on Jan. 1 due to falling fuel prices
summary: Duke Energy Carolinas customers in North Carolina will see their electric rates fall starting Jan. 1 as part of an annual adjustment for the cost of fuel used to generate electricity at its power...
